ud5.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud5.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahakaccano avantisu viharati kuraraghare pavatte pabbate.
ud5.6:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena sono upasako kutikanno ayasmato mahakaccanassa upatthako hoti.
ud5.6:2.1: Atha kho sonassa upasakassa kutikannassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud5.6:2.2: “yatha yatha kho ayyo mahakaccano dhammam deseti nayidam sukaram agaram ajjhavasata ekantaparipunnam ekantaparisuddham sankhalikhitam brahmacariyam caritum.
ud5.6:2.3: Yannunaham kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyan”ti.
ud5.6:3.1: Atha kho sono upasako kutikanno yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud5.6:3.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho sono upasako kutikanno ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
ud5.6:4.1: “Idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud5.6:4.2: ‘yatha yatha kho ayyo mahakaccano dhammam deseti nayidam sukaram agaram ajjhavasata ekantaparipunnam ekantaparisuddham sankhalikhitam brahmacariyam caritum.
ud5.6:4.3: Yannunaham kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyan’ti.
ud5.6:5.1: Evam vutte, ayasma mahakaccano sonam upasakam kutikannam etadavoca:
ud5.6:5.2: “dukkaram kho, sona, yavajivam ekabhattam ekaseyyam brahmacariyam.
ud5.6:5.3: Ingha tvam, sona, tattheva agarikabhuto samano buddhanam sasanam anuyunja kalayuttam ekabhattam ekaseyyam brahmacariyan”ti.
ud5.6:5.4: Atha kho sonassa upasakassa kutikannassa yo ahosi pabbajjabhisankharo so patipassambhi.
ud5.6:6.2: dutiyampi kho ayasma mahakaccano sonam upasakam kutikannam etadavoca:
ud5.6:6.3: “dukkaram kho, sona, yavajivam ekabhattam ekaseyyam brahmacariyam.
ud5.6:6.4: Ingha tvam, sona, tattheva agarikabhuto samano buddhanam sasanam anuyunja kalayuttam ekabhattam ekaseyyam brahmacariyan”ti.
ud5.6:6.5: Dutiyampi kho sonassa upasakassa kutikannassa yo ahosi pabbajjabhisankharo so patipassambhi.
ud5.6:7.1: Tatiyampi kho sonassa upasakassa kutikannassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud5.6:7.2: “yatha yatha kho ayyo mahakaccano dhammam deseti nayidam sukaram agaram ajjhavasata ekantaparipunnam ekantaparisuddham sankhalikhitam brahmacariyam caritum.
ud5.6:7.3: Yannunaham kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyan”ti.
ud5.6:7.4: Tatiyampi kho sono upasako kutikanno yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud5.6:7.5: Ekamantam nisinno kho sono upasako kutikanno ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
ud5.6:8.1: “Idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud5.6:8.2: ‘yatha yatha kho ayyo mahakaccano dhammam deseti nayidam sukaram agaram ajjhavasata ekantaparipunnam ekantaparisuddham sankhalikhitam brahmacariyam caritum.
ud5.6:8.3: Yannunaham kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyan’ti.
ud5.6:9.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakaccano sonam upasakam kutikannam pabbajesi.
ud5.6:9.2: Tena kho pana samayena avantidakkhinapatho appabhikkhuko hoti.
ud5.6:9.3: Atha kho ayasma mahakaccano tinnam vassanam accayena kicchena kasirena tato tato dasavaggam bhikkhusangham sannipatetva ayasmantam sonam upasampadesi.
ud5.6:10.1: Atha kho ayasmato sonassa vassamvutthassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud5.6:10.2: “na kho me so bhagava sammukha dittho, api ca sutoyeva me:
ud5.6:10.4: Sace mam upajjhayo anujaneyya, gaccheyyaham tam bhagavantam dassanaya arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti.
ud5.6:11.1: Atha kho ayasma sono sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud5.6:11.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sono ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
ud5.6:12.1: “Idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud5.6:12.2: ‘na kho me so bhagava sammukha dittho, api ca sutoyeva me—
ud5.6:12.3: so bhagava idiso ca idiso ca’ti.
ud5.6:12.4: Sace mam upajjhayo anujaneyya, gaccheyyaham tam bhagavantam dassanaya arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti.
ud5.6:13.2: gaccha tvam, sona, tam bhagavantam dassanaya arahantam sammasambuddham.
ud5.6:13.3: Dakkhissasi tvam, sona, tam bhagavantam pasadikam pasadaniyam santindriyam santamanasam uttamadamathasamathamanuppattam dantam guttam yatindriyam nagam.
ud5.6:13.4: Disvana mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandahi, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam puccha:
ud5.6:13.5: ‘upajjhayo me, bhante, ayasma mahakaccano bhagavato pade sirasa vandati, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati’”ti.
ud5.6:14.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma sono ayasmato mahakaccanassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana ayasmantam mahakaccanam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena savatthi tena carikam pakkami.
ud5.6:14.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena savatthi jetavanam anathapindikassa aramo, yena bhagava tenupasankami, upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud5.6:14.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sono bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.6:14.4: “upajjhayo me, bhante, ayasma mahakaccano bhagavato pade sirasa vandati, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati”ti.
ud5.6:15.1: “Kacci, bhikkhu, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kaccisi appakilamathena addhanam agato, na ca pindakena kilantosi”ti?
ud5.6:15.2: “Khamaniyam, bhagava, yapaniyam, bhagava, appakilamathena caham, bhante, addhanam agato, na ca pindakena kilantomhi”ti.
ud5.6:16.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud5.6:16.5: ‘imassananda, agantukassa bhikkhuno senasanam pannapehi’ti, icchati bhagava tena bhikkhuna saddhim ekavihare vatthum, icchati bhagava ayasmata sonena saddhim ekavihare vatthun”ti.
ud5.6:16.6: Yasmim vihare bhagava viharati, tasmim vihare ayasmato sonassa senasanam pannapesi.
ud5.6:17.1: Atha kho bhagava bahudeva rattim abbhokase nisajjaya vitinametva pade pakkhaletva viharam pavisi.
ud5.6:17.2: Ayasmapi kho sono bahudeva rattim abbhokase nisajjaya vitinametva pade pakkhaletva viharam pavisi.
ud5.6:17.3: Atha kho bhagava rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya ayasmantam sonam ajjhesi:
ud5.6:18.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma sono bhagavato patissutva solasa atthakavaggikani sabbaneva sarena abhani.
ud5.6:18.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmato sonassa sarabhannapariyosane abbhanumodi:
ud5.6:18.3: “sadhu sadhu, bhikkhu, suggahitani te, bhikkhu, solasa atthakavaggikani sumanasikatani supadharitani, kalyaniyasi vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya.
ud5.6:18.6: “Kissa pana tvam, bhikkhu, evam ciram akasi”ti?
ud5.6:18.8: api ca sambadho gharavaso bahukicco bahukaraniyo”ti.
ud5.6:19.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
